sentences.sContent: The engine for maglev trains is rather in noticeable.
sentences.sContent_eng: The engine for maglev trains is rather in noticeable.
sentences.sCn: 磁悬浮列车的车头是相当值得注意的。

sentences.sContent: A good example of how transportation is changing is the new maglev train, which is environmentally friendly, energy-saving and travels at an amazing 430 km/h.
sentences.sContent_eng: A good example of how transportation is changing is the new maglev train, which is environmentally friendly, energy-saving and travels at an amazing 430 km/h.
sentences.sCn: 新型的磁悬浮列车就是交通运输变化的一个很好的例子。它既环保，又节约能源，还能以430公里的惊人时速行驶。

trans.tranOther: a type of high-speed train that runs on magnets supported by a magnetic field generated around the track
